column2:
Instructions:  Find former customer decks, RFPs or BVAs to learn from. Do not present any proprietary contents of these materials to prospects and customers. 

Want to add your customer work? Submit it here. Reach out to Tejal Desai, Business Value Consultant or Reshma Bynum, CSM for any questions!

Be sure to use the latest Gladly Presentation Template & reference the Customer Meeting Slides (Megadeck) for CS meeting structure
column8:
Definitions:
- BVA: Business value assessment that highlights current and/or future value in terms of cost savings and revenue growth.
- EBR: Executive Business Review that summarizes progress to date, partnership history, and future opportunities, more customized for top customers.
- QBR: Quarterly Business Review that summarizes progress to date and opportunities for future optimization.
- RFX: A comprehensive proposal and response to a customer or prospect request (RFP, RFI)
- Strategy Session: a customer meeting that intends to drive a discussion around Hero or Sidekick optimization and/or expansion opportunities
